title: Der vergängliche Ruhm der Herrschaft (1990)
description: Episodes from entire military history of Portugal are told through flashbacks as a professorish soldier recounts them while marching through a Portuguese African colony in 1973. He easily draws his comrades into philosophical musings, and the little contingent suffers badly at the hands of the local military opposition. Written by Anonymous
characterList: Ens. Cabrita / Viriato / Don João de Portugal
Soldier Manuel / Lusitanian Warriror / Don João's Cousin
Soldier Salvador / Lusitanian Warrior / Alcácer Warrior
Cpl. Brito / Lusitanian Warrior / Alcácer Nobleman
Preacher at Funeral / Suicidal Warrior (as Rui de Carvalho)
